file.title: Get previous row

p.text: Returns the number of a row which goes before the current row in the area of selection. If the last row was returned before the command would return now the last but one row. Next time it'll return the row previous to that row which is last but one row and so on.

file.seealso:
Get first row
Get previous row
Get last row
